channel.title: Xteleall
channel.description: Can you give me an xteleall command?

item.title: Xteleall
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:2, topic:269779”] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“xteleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client) p; // specific player’s client

                castOn.teleportToX = absX; // replace with your tele X coord
                castOn.teleportToY = absY; // replace with your tele Y coord
            }
        }
    }[/quote]

It isn’t necessary to cast p to a Client object since absX and absY are fields in the Player class.

Oh, congratulations on becoming a moderator by the way.
I knew it was just a matter of time.

Read full topic

item.title: Xteleall
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“xteleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client) p; // specific player’s client

                castOn.teleportToX = absX; // replace with your tele X coord
                castOn.teleportToY = absY; // replace with your tele Y coord
            }
        }
    }[/code]
